Become the Slayer in an epic single-player campaign to conquer demons across dimensions and stop the final destruction of humanity. The only thing they fear... is you. Experience the ultimate combination of speed and power in DOOM Eternal - the next leap in push-forward, first-person combat. And enter BATTLEMODE, the new 2 versus 1 multiplayer experience where a fully-armed DOOM Slayer faces off against two player-controlled demons, fighting it out in a best-of-five round match of intense first-person combat. The Deluxe Edition includes: (1) Year One Pass (2) Demonic Slayer Skin (3) Classic Weapon Sound Pack.
632522xe7doometernaldluxitinmuxb.name: DOOM Eternal Deluxe Edition

6b43cega8justshapesbeatjuthapndb.description: Just Shapes & Beats is a chaotic co-op musical bullet-hell based on three simple things: avoid Shapes, move to the rad Beats, and die, repeatedly. It’s a new spin on SHMUPs, adding a layer of coop that's at the core of the game: 'cause everything is better with friends.
6b43cega8justshapesbeatjuthapndb.name: Just Shapes & Beats

6d0d86g16laracroftndtheempsi1605.description: Lara Croft and the Temple of Osiris is the sequel to the critically-acclaimed Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light, and the first-ever four-player co-op experience with Lara Croft. Featuring stunning visuals and a brand-new story, players must work together to explore the temple, defeat hordes of enemies from the Egyptian underworld, solve devious puzzles, and avoid deadly traps. All the while, players will compete for treasure, powerful artifacts, and ultimate bragging rights.
6d0d86g16laracroftndtheempsi1605.name: Lara Croft and the Temple of Osiris

731828ga6getpackedgetpacked69b2a.description: Get Packed is a couch co-op removals game full of calamity and physics-based carnage for 1-4 players. When a greedy salt mining company takes over Ditchlington, Last Ditch Removals must handle the hostile eviction. With little time and even less caution, your ragtag removals team gets to work rapidly relocating the entire town… leaving a trail of destruction, explosions, and furniture fragments in your wake! Are you ready for some destructive fun with friends? Things you'll love: 1 - 4 player local and online co-op. Campaign and Destruction game modes. Co-op chaos and carnage across 12 locations. 4 Customizable/Playable characters
731828ga6getpackedgetpacked69b2a.name: Get Packed

76309bg55onehandclappigerlycssgm.description:
Stadia Early Access Disclaimer:
This game is an unfinished product; it might have playability issues (including the potential loss of save progress), change without notice, and may or may not be updated further or completed. Purchase only if you want to play the game in its current state of development. You may lose access if the publisher does not finish the game. Learn more about early access [https://support.google.com/stadia?p=early_access].

We wanted to give you access to the game as soon as possible. The first version contains about a third of the desert area and can be solved in 10 to 20 minutes. We plan to update the game with additional content in a two month interval. The full game will be released in the second half of 2021 with a playtime of 3-4 hours. Microphone is currently not supported on mobile! Please head to our official Community Site [https://discord.gg/BmdxDDj] to join the discussions!

Experience a 2D platformer with a very unique mechanic: change the world with your voice! One Hand Clapping lets you discover the power that rests within your vocal cords while solving unique puzzles that will require rhythm and a good ear. You must build confidence in your singing voice and explore several different mechanics to overcome harmonic and pitch-focused challenges. Don’t be afraid of hitting the wrong notes, it is all about taking risks and learning from your mistakes. Find out how far your voice can take you! - Please be aware, that this game is still in early development and new features and levels will be added in future updates.
76309bg55onehandclappigerlycssgm.name: One Hand Clapping - Early Access

7bfbcbgf3mortalkomba1f54762d8e90.description: Mortal Kombat 11 is the latest installment in the critically acclaimed franchise, providing a deeper and more personalized experience than ever before. The all new Custom Character Variations give you unprecedented control of your fighters to make them your own.
7bfbcbgf3mortalkomba1f54762d8e90.name: Mortal Kombat 11

7bfbcbo01terminator80f1325b647d9.description: The Terminator T-800 from "Terminator: Dark Fate" is a cyborg assassin, sent back in time from a post-apocalyptic future. He is nearly indestructible and possesses superior technology, fighting skills and artificial intelligence making him the ultimate killing machine.
7bfbcbo01terminator80f1325b647d9.name: Terminator T-800

7bfbcbo09sheeva050327597b64f8cd1.description: The male Shokan scoffed when Sheeva entered their contest to choose the Shokan's next leader. But Sheeva proved herself more than their equal. After a resounding victory, she was crowned the first Queen of the Shokan. As Queen, Sheeva now leads her people in the fight to attain their rightful place, as partners in Outworld's rule.
7bfbcbo09sheeva050327597b64f8cd1.name: Sheeva

7bfbcbo14mortalkomba1pc437f2e06d.description:
Kombat Pack includes:
• 6 new add-on playable characters including Shang Tsung, Nightwolf, Terminator T-800, Sindel, The Joker and Spawn
• 7 Kombat Pack Exclusive Character Skins for Johnny Cage, Sonya Blade, Cassie Cage, Jacqui Briggs, Geras and Shang Tsung
• 6 themed Skin Packs including the Klassic Arcade Ninjas, Klassic Arcade Fighters, Double Feature, Gothic Horror, Matinee and DC Elseworlds
7bfbcbo14mortalkomba1pc437f2e06d.name: Mortal Kombat 11 Kombat Pack

7bfbcbo16matineeskinpc4197d638fb.description: This item is already included in the Kombat Pack. Three new character skins. The Matinee Skin Pack includes Osh-Tekk Vandal Kotal Kahn, Swashbuckler Erron Black, and Space Marine Jacqui Briggs.
7bfbcbo16matineeskinpc4197d638fb.name: Matinee Skin Pack

7bfbcbo20klasicrdefghtp2b8091654.description: This item is already included in the Kombat Pack. Three new character skins. The Klassic Arcade Fighter Pack outfits Mortal Kombat 11 characters Jax, Kung Lao and Kano in Klassic, Arcade inspired costumes.
7bfbcbo20klasicrdefghtp2b8091654.name: Klassic Arcade Fighter Pack

7bfbcbo29doublefatrskinpc5974830.description: This item is already included in the Kombat Pack. Three new character skins. The Double Feature Skin Pack includes Cyborg Hunter Sonya Blade, Cash Machine Kano and Red Carpet Johnny Cage.
7bfbcbo29doublefatrskinpc5974830.name: Double Feature Skin Pack

7bfbcbo4ashangtsung58d8ee21f164b.description: Soul Sorcerer and historic host of the Mortal Kombat. Born in Earthrealm, Shang Tsung's relentless pursuit of powerful magic led him to Outworld, where Shao Kahn offered him a dark power that no sorcerer on Earthrealm could. Shang Tsung pledged his eternal loyalty to Shao Kahn in exchange for this evil magic, but he is no faithful servant. He dreams of the day his sorcery will overtake Shao Kahn's, and he'll pay any price to get there.
7bfbcbo4ashangtsung58d8ee21f164b.name: Shang Tsung

7bfbcbo56spawn59615c0cab44ef83d7.description: Al Simmons, once the U.S. government's greatest soldier and most effective assassin, was mercilessly executed by his own men. Resurrected from the ashes of his own grave in a flawed agreement with the powers of darkness, Simmons is reborn as a creature from the depths of Hell. A Hellspawn. Now he is thrust into the world of Mortal Kombat, where he will fight for supremacy against all Kombatants.
7bfbcbo56spawn59615c0cab44ef83d7.name: Spawn

7bfbcbo58robocp7ec7a533d24948b06.description: Alex Murphy was a dutiful police officer who was brutally executed by a local gang. Brought back to life through OCP technology, Murphy was transformed into RoboCop, a highly advanced cybernetic police officer designed to uphold the law and protect the innocent. Now entering the Mortal Kombat universe, RoboCop has received a few upgrades and is ready to serve the public by apprehending any Kombatants that stand in his way.
7bfbcbo58robocp7ec7a533d24948b06.name: RoboCop

7bfbcbo7eklasicrdenjp19860bf4372.description: This item is already included in the Kombat Pack. Three new character skins. The Klassic Arcade Ninja Skin Pack outfits Mortal Kombat 11 characters Scorpion, Sub-Zero and Noob Saibot in Klassic, Arcade inspired costumes.
7bfbcbo7eklasicrdenjp19860bf4372.name: Klassic Arcade Ninja Skin Pack 1

7bfbcbo83shaokahn9910f3d261845bc.description: Play as Shao Kahn, fully playable character. Emperor of Outworld. For millennia, Shao Kahn dominated the realms, rapidly expanding his Empire by conquest. But when he set out to claim Earthrealm, he was blocked by the rules of Mortal Kombat. Deterred but determined, Shao Kahn demands absolute victory.
7bfbcbo83shaokahn9910f3d261845bc.name: Shao Kahn

7bfbcbo8cmortalkomba1feh04cd9582.description:
Experience MK's first-ever major expansion. Aftermath features a brand-new cinematic story centered around trust and deceit. Forge a new history.

Includes:
• All-New Cinematic Story
• 3 New Playable Fighters - Sheeva, Fujin & guest RoboCop
• 3 New Skin Packs
7bfbcbo8cmortalkomba1feh04cd9582.name: Mortal Kombat 11: Aftermath

7bfbcbo93fujina374a1e38cf45b6d09.description: The God of Wind, Fujin serves the Elder Gods alongside his brother, Raiden, as Protectors of Earthrealm. Affable and lighthearted, he's adept at inspiring peoples' innate capacity for goodness and heroism to conquer forces of hatred and tyranny. Fujin believes Earthrealm's best days are still to come, and he fights to ensure that bright future.
7bfbcbo93fujina374a1e38cf45b6d09.name: Fujin

7bfbcbo9csindeled3b11f29b448275c.description: The former Queen of Edenia will stop at nothing to keep her place. When threatened with the loss of her throne when Shao Kahn conquered her realm, Sindel betrayed her husband, and her people, to keep her privileged position. Now Shao Kahn's wife and Queen of Outworld, she enjoys power and wealth beyond most people's imagination. Good luck to anyone who tries to take it from her.
7bfbcbo9csindeled3b11f29b448275c.name: Sindel

7bfbcboa8gothicrsknpa04e751f6b2d.description: This item is already included in the Kombat Pack. Three new character skins. The Gothic Horror Skin Pack includes Goddess of the Damned Cetrion, Kronika's Monster Geras, and Impaler Raiden.
7bfbcboa8gothicrsknpa04e751f6b2d.name: Gothic Horror Skin Pack

7bfbcbobcdcelsworkinpa9762f1b450.description: This item is already included in the Kombat Pack. Three new character skins. The DC Elseworlds Skin Pack delivers DC Comics inspired versions of Mortal Kombat characters including Darkest Knight Noob Saibot, Killer Krok Baraka and Katwoman of Outworld Kitana.
7bfbcbobcdcelsworkinpa9762f1b450.name: DC Elseworlds Skin Pack

7bfbcboc6thejokerc53c411bb046908.description: Unpredictable, violent and incredibly dangerous, The Joker is chaos personified. He's killed a Robin, crippled Batgirl and tortured and murdered countless people throughout the DC universe. And now, he's the latest Kombatant to join in Mortal Kombat.
7bfbcboc6thejokerc53c411bb046908.name: The Joker

7bfbcbocbmortalkb1fehpcund095437.description:
Includes Aftermath and Kombat Pack.

Experience MK's first-ever major expansion. Aftermath features a brand-new cinematic story centered around trust and deceit. Forge a new history.

• All-New Cinematic Story
• 3 New Playable Fighters - Sheeva, Fujin & RoboCop
• 3 New Skin Packs
7bfbcbocbmortalkb1fehpcund095437.name: Mortal Kombat 11: Aftermath + Kombat Pack Bundle

7bfbcboe9nightwolf951c38ae24db06.description: Every generation, the Great Spirit chooses a worthy warrior to become Nightwolf: the Matoka's champion and protector. Grey Cloud proved worthy when he laid down his life to prevent the Black Dragon from plundering what remained of his tribe's sacred artifacts. As Nightwolf, Grey Cloud possesses extraordinary magic granted by the Great Spirit. He uses it not only to fight for the Matoka's future, but also to defend all of Earthrealm.
7bfbcboe9nightwolf951c38ae24db06.name: Nightwolf

7bfbcbxeamortalkb1fehcin460d7352.description:
Includes Mortal Kombat 11, Kombat Pack and MK11: Aftermath.

• Experience the original MK11 cinematic story and Aftermath, the brand new story conclusion
• Play as the entire 34-character MK11 roster incl. new fighters Sheeva, Fujin and RoboCop
• All-New Friendships & Stage Fatalities
7bfbcbxeamortalkb1fehcin460d7352.name: Mortal Kombat 11: Aftermath Kollection

80a70cg66dragonballxenoverse2gam.description: DRAGON BALL XENOVERSE 2 gives players the ultimate DRAGON BALL gaming experience! Develop your own warrior, create the perfect avatar, train to learn new skills & help fight new enemies to restore the original story of the DRAGON BALL series. Join 300 players from around the world in the new hub city of Conton & fight with or against them.
80a70cg66dragonballxenoverse2gam.name: DRAGON BALL XENOVERSE 2

819cdfgf4steamworldheistgame4b7f.description: In SteamWorld Heist, you command a steam-driven pirate crew in a series of epic tactical shootouts. It’s turn-based strategy with a twist: You manually aim the guns of your robots, allowing for insane skill shots and bullet-bouncing action! As the captain you will board, loot and shoot your way through enemy spaceships. Overcome the challenges of the vast frontier by upgrading your recruits with unique abilities, weapons – and even stylish hats!
819cdfgf4steamworldheistgame4b7f.name: SteamWorld Heist

8615c8g78rage2game57d7d54efebd94.description: An asteroid has annihilated 80% of the earth’s population, and humanity’s numbers are dwindling. Ruthless and bloodthirsty gangs roam the open roads and the tyrannical Authority seek to rule with an iron fist. As Walker, the last Ranger of the wasteland and a threat to their power, you have been robbed of your home and left for dead. Now you’ll have to rage for justice and freedom. With ludicrous vehicle combat, super-powered first-person mayhem, and an open world full of emergent madness, you will tear across an unforgiving wasteland battling sadistic gangs to find the tools and tech needed to crush the oppressive rule of The Authority once and for all.
8615c8g78rage2game57d7d54efebd94.name: RAGE 2

8615c8od6rage2deluxcontntpackr2d.description: The RAGE 2: Deluxe Content gives you: Rise of the Ghosts Expansion, Doom BFG, Wasteland Wizard Cheat Codes, Battle Standard, Progress Booster.
8615c8od6rage2deluxcontntpackr2d.name: RAGE 2: Deluxe Content Pack

8615c8x65rage2deluxeditionluxton.description: Dive headfirst into a dystopian world devoid of society, law, and order. RAGE 2 brings together two studio powerhouses – Avalanche Studios, masters of open world insanity, and id Software, creators of the first-person shooter – to deliver a carnival of carnage where you can go anywhere, shoot anything, and explode everything. Purchase the  RAGE 2: Deluxe Edition to receive: Rise of the Ghosts Expansion, Doom BFG, Wasteland Wizard Cheat Codes, Battle Standard, Progress Booster.
8615c8x65rage2deluxeditionluxton.name: RAGE 2: Deluxe Edition

879d82g8cmetroexodusmetroexodus5.description: Metro Exodus is an epic, story-driven first person shooter from 4A Games that blends deadly combat and stealth with exploration and survival horror in one of the most immersive game worlds ever created. Flee the shattered ruins of dead Moscow and embark on an epic, continent-spanning journey across post-apocalyptic Russia in the greatest Metro adventure yet. Explore the Russian wilderness in vast, non-linear levels and follow a thrilling story-line inspired by the novels of Dmitry Glukhovsky that spans an entire year through spring, summer and autumn to the depths of nuclear winter.
879d82g8cmetroexodusmetroexodus5.name: Metro Exodus

879d82o6ametroexodussamtryxdulc2.description: Sam, one of the soldiers of the Spartan Order, makes his way away from the Aurora in search of a way back to his home of the USA, arriving at the remains of Vladivostok’s tsunami ravaged harbours, ruined industrial buildings, and crumbling residential districts. Players will forge Sam's path through this landscape, as they take a brand new journey across the wasteland of post-apocalyptic Russia.
879d82o6ametroexodussamtryxdulc2.name: Metro Exodus - Sam's Story

879d82oa3metroexodusthwclnlsmrx1.description: Following the journey and experiences of Khlebnikov during the last days of life in Novosibirsk, retraced by Colonel Miller a year later, players can expect the classic story-driven gameplay of the Metro series in this new linear chapter, complete with a brand new weapon, the deadly flame-thrower, claustrophobic environments, and the all-too-familiar hair-raising tension.
879d82oa3metroexodusthwclnlsmrx1.name: Metro Exodus - The Two Colonels

879d82xb1metroexodusglditinmrxus.description: The Gold Edition includes the Metro Exodus Expansion Pass. The Metro Exodus Expansion Pass will contain two major pieces of story-driven DLC for the game, following brand new stories from the world of Metro: The Two Colonels & Sam’s Story – Early 2020. Flee the shattered ruins of the Moscow Metro and embark on an epic, continent-spanning journey across the post-apocalyptic Russian wilderness. Explore vast, non-linear levels, lose yourself in an immersive, sandbox survival experience, and follow a thrilling story-line that spans an entire year in the greatest Metro adventure yet.
879d82xb1metroexodusglditinmrxus.name: Metro Exodus - Gold Edition

8a3cc5g32footballmanager2020fm20.description: Manage your football club, your way, in a living, breathing football universe which places you at its very heart. In this latest instalment of the best-selling series, every footballing decision is yours to make; from creating tactical styles and training schedules to assembling an elite backroom staff and working with your scouts to build the ultimate squad. The question is, at which of the world’s best clubs will your journey begin? There are over 100 leagues from 50 countries to choose from. FM20 is a world that rewards planning and knowledge but, unlike other games, there’s no script or pre-defined ending – just endless possibilities. How you get to the top is up to you; you own your decision, and their consequences. Football Manager 2020 is not optimized for mobile devices.
8a3cc5g32footballmanager2020fm20.name: Football Manager 2020

8b7e7fg67assassinscreedodyeygame.description: Choose your fate in Assassin's Creed Odyssey. From outcast to living legend, embark on an odyssey to uncover the secrets of your past and change the fate of Ancient Greece. The Stadia Standard Edition includes Assassin's Creed Odyssey, The Blind King quest, and The Kronos Pack featuring 5 epic pieces of armour, an epic weapon and an epic mount.
8b7e7fg67assassinscreedodyeygame.name: Assassin's Creed® Odyssey

8b7e7fo6fassasincreedodyytionpxp.description: Continue your epic odyssey with the Stadia Season Pass, featuring two major episodic story arcs and bonus Secrets of Greece missions! In LEGACY OF THE FIRST BLADE,  encounter the legend who first wielded the Hidden Blade to change the course of history. In THE FATE OF ATLANTIS, venture into the fabled realms of Greek mythology to discover your hero's true power and unravel the mysteries of the First Civilisation. If you have purchased Assassin's Creed Odyssey - Stadia Ultimate Edition, you already own this content. It is included in Assassin's Creed Odyssey - Stadia Ultimate Edition.
8b7e7fo6fassasincreedodyytionpxp.name: Assassin's Creed Odyssey - Stadia Season Pass

8b7e7fx28assaincreedodyytiultmgb.description: Upgrade your experience with the Stadia Ultimate edition, which includes Assassin's Creed Odyssey, the Blind King Quest, the Stadia Season Pass, the Herald of Dusk Pack (featuring 5 rare pieces of armour and a rare weapon), the Capricornus Naval Pack (featuring a ship design and crew theme), a temporary XP Boost, a Temporary Drachmae Boost , and the Kronos Pack, featuring 5 epic pieces of armour, an epic weapon, and an epic mount. Choose your fate in Assassin's Creed Odyssey. From outcast to living legend, embark on an odyssey to uncover the secrets of your past and change the fate of Ancient Greece.
8b7e7fx28assaincreedodyytiultmgb.name: Assassin's Creed Odyssey - Stadia Ultimate Edition

8e77c7g2dstrangebrigadestrangbid.description: Egypt, 1930's. Erased from ancient history and buried in a nameless tomb for 4,000 years, Seteki the Witch Queen has risen once again. Only one troop of daring heroes can stand against the fearsome power of Seteki and her army of mummified monstrosities: The Strange Brigade! Explore remarkable ruins, solve perilous puzzles and uncover tantalising treasure while blasting your way through an array of undead enemies in thrilling third-person action that’s certain to bring out your inner adventurer!
8e77c7g2dstrangebrigadestrangbid.name: Strange Brigade

8e77c7o1astrangebrigadeseasonpop.description: Continue the adventure with the Strange Brigade Season Pass! The Season Pass will give players access to all post-launch content. Featuring a treasure chest worth of brand new campaign and customisation content, the Season Pass will include: Thrilling campaign content! Dashing new characters! Powerful new weapons and items! Explosive new amulets! More!
8e77c7o1astrangebrigadeseasonpop.name: Strange Brigade - Season Pass

8e77c7xfdstrangebrigadedluxitonl.description: Upgrade your Strange Brigade experience with the DELUXE EDITION, which includes the game, the Season Pass, and the Secret Service Weapons Pack! The Season Pass will include brand new campaign missions, playable characters, character skins, weapons, weapon skins + much more! Seteki the Witch Queen has risen once again, and only one troop of daring heroes can stand against her fearsome army of mummified monstrosities: The Strange Brigade! Explore remarkable ruins, solve perilous puzzles and uncover tantalising treasure while blasting your way through an array of undead enemies in thrilling third-person action that’s certain to bring out your inner adventurer!
8e77c7xfdstrangebrigadedluxitonl.name: Strange Brigade Deluxe Edition

921e9agf1spitlings5f4901cea8bd3j.description: You know what the problem with multiplayer games is, right? The other players! It’s always THEIR FAULT if you lose! We’ve got the perfect game to blame your friends for their incapability: Spitlings! This chaotic action arcade game for up to four players is a modern take on the hardcore classics. You’re in control of a Spitling, a charming rectangular creature with teeth it can spit or use to jump! Makes no sense? Who cares, it’s FUN! Spitlings is a cute but hardcore Arcade game that’s made for playing its hundreds of levels locally/online with friends. Keep playing to unlock new music tracks, unique characters to play with and intense visual themes for certain levels.
921e9agf1spitlings5f4901cea8bd3j.name: Spitlings

9b3ea6gdemetro2033reduxmetro2033.description: In 2013 the world was devastated by an apocalyptic event. A handful of survivors took refuge in the depths of the Moscow underground…The year is 2033. You are Artyom, born in the last days before the fire, but raised Underground. One fateful event sparks a desperate mission to the heart of the Metro system, to warn the remnants of mankind of a terrible impending threat. Metro 2033 Redux is the definitive version of the cult classic ‘Metro 2033’. Fans of the original game will find the unique world of Metro transformed with incredible lighting, physics and dynamic weather effects. Newcomers will get the chance to experience one of the finest story-driven shooters of all time; an epic adventure combining gripping survival horror, exploration and tactical combat and stealth.
9b3ea6gdemetro2033reduxmetro2033.name: Metro 2033 Redux

a03141g01trialsrisingtrialsgame9.description: Explore over-the-top action and physics-bending motorcycle racing in the latest opus of the Trials franchise.  All new features, more competitions and more tracks means new challenges. Ride challenging tracks around the world – from the Great Wall of China and New York City to the Eiffel Tower and everywhere in between. With the new hilarious Tandem Bike, get your friends and try to control one bike with two riders. From your local backyard to worldwide stadiums, defeat all your opponents online and rise to glory. Create and share unique levels in Track Central using over 10 000 items available. Possibilities are endless , and so is the fun.
a03141g01trialsrisingtrialsgame9.name: Trials Rising

a03141oedtrialsrisingexpansopexo.description: Extend your world tour with the Trials Rising , Expansion pass including 55+ additional tracks to master! The pass will include all the following content: Stuntman Rider Pack: defy the laws of gravity and fly through rings of fire with this flashy costume. Ride accross the US along the famous Route 66 and explore the American southwest. The pack also includes the Touchdown outfit which lets you cross the finish line as an American football player. Go beyond the Equator to see the wonders of the Southern Hemisphere! Globe-trot your way from icy Antartica to the jungle-covered mountains of Peru and more!
a03141oedtrialsrisingexpansopexo.name: Trials Rising - Expansion Pass

a03141xcctrialsrisingdgtalgodeon.description: Explore over-the-top action and physics-bending motorcycle racing in the latest entry of the Trials franchise.  With new tracks  and more ways to compete, Trials Rising is easy to pick-up and play, challenging to master and offers the best multiplayer racing experience. Get an additional 55+ tracks with the Expansion Pass: Explore the American southwest  and go on wild rides in Trials Rising Sixty-Six. Go on an epic adventure below the equator in Trials Rising Crash & Sunburn, globe-trotting in exotic locations. Cut up the competition while you sport The Samurai Item Pack. Defy the laws of gravity with The Stuntman Rider Pack.
a03141xcctrialsrisingdgtalgodeon.name: Trials Rising - Digital Gold Edition

a38d98gf8attackonin2filble2edgm0.description: "Attack on Titan 2: Final Battle" contains the latest content for the tactical hunting action series based on the hit anime series "Attack on Titan". More than 40 playable characters join the battle! Through "Story Mode" experience the drama of seasons 1 and 2 of the anime firsthand, playing as the game-original protagonist! Via "Another Mode" play as other characters, too, and enjoy versus and cooperative battles online with other players as well! In "Character Episode Mode" experience season 3 through the eyes of the characters of the original anime! "Territory Recovery Mode" lets you create your own regiment and gather comrades to try and recapture territory outside the Walls!
a38d98gf8attackonin2filble2edgm0.name: Attack on Titan 2: Final Battle

a44762g16finalfantasyxv151000002.description: Take the journey, now in ultimate quality. Boasting a wealth of bonus content and supporting ultra high-resolution graphical options and HDR 10, you can now enjoy the beautiful and carefully-crafted experience of FINAL FANTASY XV like never before.
a44762g16finalfantasyxv151000002.name: FINAL FANTASY XV

a4c5ebg71playerunknowsbattlegd01.description: This is Battle Royale. Land, loot and outwit your opponents to become the last player left standing in a thrilling game experience full of unexpected, adrenaline-pumping moments. For more information, please visit www.pubg.com.
a4c5ebg71playerunknowsbattlegd01.name: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

a4c5ebo0bpubgchallengerpackpubhk.description:
Grab Challenger Pack and get ready for your Payback. 

Includes:
- 1,100 G-Coin
- Cerulean Challenger - SCAR-L
- Networked Gloves
a4c5ebo0bpubgchallengerpackpubhk.name: PUBG - Challenger Pack

a4c5ebo0bpubgpaybackpackpubgayck.description:
Return to Sanhok and Get the best out of your Payback. Meet the secret of Sanhok 4 hidden in the lush jungle with Survivor Pass : Payback.

Includes:
- Survivor Pass: Payback
- 5 Levels
- Retro Track Jacket
- Her Galaxy Shirt
- Her Galaxy Shorts
- Soccer Cleats and Socks (Teal)
a4c5ebo0bpubgpaybackpackpubgayck.name: PUBG - Payback Pack

a4c5ebo2epubgstadiapremiersxcvkn.description: This set includes Premiere Hoodie, Premiere Glasses, Premiere Helmet (Level 3), Premiere Parachute and Premiere Pan
a4c5ebo2epubgstadiapremiersxcvkn.name: PUBG - Stadia Premiere Set

a4c5ebx48playerunknowsbattlegdci.description:
Return to Sanhok and Get the best out of your Payback.

Meet the new  Sanhok where the first legendary Squad who managed to escape from the Battlegrounds were born from. This epic escape of the Squad was recorded in the secret lab in Sanhok, still left abandoned waiting for someone to find them.

This bundle includes Playerunknown's Battlegrounds basegame, Survivor Pass: Payback and PUBG Season 8 themed Skin set.
a4c5ebx48playerunknowsbattlegdci.name: PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds - Payback Edition

b17f16g2atheeldrscrolsonintamiug.description: The fantasy role-playing series, The Elder Scrolls, goes online – no game subscription required. Embark upon quests across Tamriel and engage in massive player versus player battles. Experience this multiplayer role-playing game on your own or with your friends, guild mates, and thousands of alliance members. The choices are yours in the world of The Elder Scrolls Online: Tamriel Unlimited. See loot box odds below.
b17f16g2atheeldrscrolsonintamiug.name: The Elder Scrolls Online: Tamriel Unlimited

b17f16o21theeldrscrolsoninwyupga.description: Venture to the warm sands of the Khajiit in The Elder Scrolls Online: Elsweyr, part of the Season of the Dragon year-long adventure. Dragons return to Tamriel! Explore the savannahs and canyons of Elsweyr, defend the home of the Khajiit from an ancient evil, and command the undead with the Necromancer class. REQUIRES THE ELDER SCROLLS ONLINE, SOLD SEPERATELY. See loot box odds below.
b17f16o21theeldrscrolsoninwyupga.name: The Elder Scrolls Online: Elsweyr Upgrade

b17f16o24theeldrscrolsoninwycpak.description: Journey to Elsweyr with bonus content exclusive to the Collector's Edition. Includes the Senche-Raht mount, Ashen Scar Jerboa pet, Khajiiti Cultural Pack, Dragonbone style converter, and the Archaic Lore Tablets momento. See loot box odds below.
b17f16o24theeldrscrolsoninwycpak.name: The Elder Scrolls Online: Elsweyr Collector's Pack

b17f16o6btheeldrscrolsoningymupa.description: The Dark Heart of Skyrim beats from the depths in The Elder Scrolls Online: Greymoor. Explore the snow-swept region of Western Skyrim and face an ancient vampiric army that once plagued Tamriel, bent on devouring souls to fuel their rebirth, as part of a year-long gothic adventure. REQUIRES THE ELDER SCROLLS ONLINE, SOLD SEPARATELY. See loot box odds below.
b17f16o6btheeldrscrolsoningymupa.name: The Elder Scrolls Online: Greymoor Upgrade

b17f16o70theeldrscrolsoninummpga.description: This upgrade is for players who already own The Elder Scrolls Online. Journey to the home of the High Elves in The Elder Scrolls Online: Summerset. Experience an epic story in an all-new zone, unlock a new skill line of abilities, and join the secretive Psijic Order on a mission to save the world from destruction. See loot box odds below.
b17f16o70theeldrscrolsoninummpga.name: The Elder Scrolls Online: Summerset Upgrade

b17f16o9atheeldrscrolsoninmwipak.description: Journey to Morrowind with bonus content exclusive to the Collector's Edition. Includes the Collector's Edition Grey War Bear, Armored War Horse mount, Dwarven Spider pet, Morag Tong converter, and exclusive emotes. See loot box odds below.
b17f16o9atheeldrscrolsoninmwipak.name: The Elder Scrolls Online: Morrowind Collector's Pack

b17f16oa9theeldrscrolsoninummpak.description: Journey to Summerset with bonus content exclusive to the Collector's Edition. Includes the Bloodshadow Wraith Steed mount, Fledgling Gryphon pet, House of Reveries emote pack, Divine Prosecution outfit style, and Psijic Scrying Talisman momento. See loot box odds below.
b17f16oa9theeldrscrolsoninummpak.name: The Elder Scrolls Online: Summerset Collector's Pack

b17f16ob2theeldrscrolsoningympak.description: Journey to Greymoor with bonus content exclusive to the Collector's Edition, which includes: Crypt Warden Death Hound mount, Death Hound pet, Skyrim Emote pack, Sword Thane outfit style, and the Orb of Magnus memento. See loot box odds below.
b17f16ob2theeldrscrolsoningympak.name: The Elder Scrolls Online: Greymoor Collector's Pack

b17f16odctheeldrscrolsoninmwupga.description: Morrowind is on the verge of destruction, and it’s up to you to save it from a deadly Daedric threat. Embark on a dangerous journey through legendary locales. See loot box odds below.
b17f16odctheeldrscrolsoninmwupga.name: The Elder Scrolls Online: Morrowind Upgrade

b17f16x06theeldrscrolsoningymgfu.description: The Dark Heart of Skyrim beats from the depths in The Elder Scrolls Online: Greymoor. Explore the snow-swept region of Western Skyrim and face an ancient vampiric army that once plagued Tamriel, bent on devouring souls to fuel their rebirth, as part of a year-long gothic adventure. The Elder Scrolls Online: Greymoor includes Elsweyr, Summerset and Morrowind Chapters, as well as the Base Game. See loot box odds below.
b17f16x06theeldrscrolsoningymgfu.name: The Elder Scrolls Online: Greymoor

b17f16x57theeldrscrolsoningymcfu.description: The Dark Heart of Skyrim beats from the depths in The Elder Scrolls Online: Greymoor. Explore the snow-swept region of Western Skyrim and face an ancient vampiric army that once plagued Tamriel, bent on devouring souls to fuel their rebirth, as part of a year-long gothic adventure. The Digital Collector's Edition includes Elsweyr CE, Summerset CE and Morrowind CE (Chapters + CE content) as well as the Base Game. See loot box odds below.
b17f16x57theeldrscrolsoningymcfu.name: The Elder Scrolls Online: Greymoor Collector's Edition

b17f16xdatheeldrscrolsonintadaib.description: Includes The Elder Scrolls Online Base game and the Morrowind Chapter. Join over 10 million players in the award-winning online multiplayer RPG and experience an ever-expanding story set across Tamriel. Explore a rich, living world with friends or embark on a solo adventure – the choice is yours to make in a persistent Elder Scrolls world. See loot box odds below.
b17f16xdatheeldrscrolsonintadaib.name: The Elder Scrolls Online: Standard Edition

b65c1cg92metrolastlighreduxmoasi.description: The awe-inspiring immersive experience of a lifetime. Join the external and internal fights that could change everything for a single Artyom. Just when hope is lost, this Artyom finds it time and time again. This game may be 3D in pixels, but it's infinitely dimensional in meaning.
b65c1cg92metrolastlighreduxmoasi.name: Metro Last Light Redux

b83283g90steamworlddig2game51821.description: SteamWorld Dig 2 takes you on a platform mining adventure forged in Metroidvania flames. When an old trading town is struck by mysterious earthquakes, it’s up to a lone steambot and her unlikely companion to uncover what trembling terrors lie beneath.
b83283g90steamworlddig2game51821.name: SteamWorld Dig 2

b84560ga1steamworldquesthandfgic.description: Triumph over evil with the hand you’re dealt! SteamWorld Quest is the roleplaying card game you’ve been waiting for! Lead a party of aspiring heroes through a beautifully hand-drawn world and intense battles using only your wits and a handful of cards. Take on whatever threat comes your way by crafting your own deck choosing from over 100 unique punch-cards! What awaits you is a luscious treasure chest filled with gold, dragons, vivid worlds, magic, knights in shining armor as well as XP, turn-based battles and all that good RPG stuff! The game’s humorous mix of traditional fantasy and steampunk robots makes for an unforgettable experience with lots of laughs.
b84560ga1steamworldquesthandfgic.name: SteamWorld Quest: Hand of Gilgamech

bbb1a1gfepowerrangesbattlfohgidb.description: Generations of Power Rangers collide across the multiverse’s 25 year history. Experience authentic, but reimagined Power Rangers gameplay. This easy to learn, but hard to master fighting game is designed to welcome players of all skill levels.
bbb1a1gfepowerrangesbattlfohgidb.name: Power Rangers: Battle for the Grid

bbb1a1o0dlordzedcharacteunlks013.description: This unlocks Lord Zedd, a full character. Do not purchase if you own Season One Pass.
bbb1a1o0dlordzedcharacteunlks013.name: Lord Zedd Character Unlock

bbb1a1o42jenscottsimfrpkhauld09g.description: This unlocks Jenn Scotts Time Force Pink, a full character. Do not purchase if you own Season One Pass.
bbb1a1o42jenscottsimfrpkhauld09g.name: Jen Scotts - Time Force Pink Character Unlock

bbb1a1o59kimberlyhartskinfompdcg.description: Kimberly Hart skin comes bundled as part of the COLLECTOR'S EDITION. Claim the COLLECTOR'S EDITION to automatically unlock this exclusive content.
bbb1a1o59kimberlyhartskinfompdcg.name: Kimberly Hart Skin for MMPR Pink

bbb1a1o93lorddrakkoneviisnflacm2.description: Lord Drakkon Evo II skin comes bundled as part of the COLLECTOR'S EDITION. Claim the COLLECTOR'S EDITION to automatically unlock this exclusive content.
bbb1a1o93lorddrakkoneviisnflacm2.name: Lord Drakkon Evo II Skin for Lord Drakkon

bbb1a1o94dragonshieldskinfojct01.description: Jason mit Dragon Shield-Skin wird im Rahmen des SAISON-1-PASS gebündelt. Kaufen Sie den SAISON-1-PASS , um diesen exklusiven Inhalt automatisch freizuschalten.
bbb1a1o94dragonshieldskinfojct01.name: Dragon Shield skin for Jason Lee Scott

bbb1a1ob8treyoftrifazgldchunks03.description: This unlocks Zeo Gold Trey, a full character. Do not purchase if you own Season One Pass.
bbb1a1ob8treyoftrifazgldchunks03.name: Trey of Triforia - Zeo Gold Character Unlock

bbb1a1xddpowerrangesbattlfohgidc.description: Generations of Power Rangers collide across the multiverse’s 25 year history. Experience authentic, but reimagined Power Rangers gameplay. This easy to learn, but hard to master fighting game is designed to welcome players of all skill levels.
bbb1a1xddpowerrangesbattlfohgidc.name: Power Rangers: Battle for the Grid Collector's Edition

be080ag95borderlands3bl3staneiti.description: The original shooter-looter returns, packing bazillions of guns and a mayhem-fueled adventure! Blast through new worlds and enemies as one of four new Vault Hunters. Play solo or with friends to take on insane enemies, score loads of loot and save your home from the most ruthless cult leaders in the galaxy.
be080ag95borderlands3bl3staneiti.name: Borderlands®3

be080ao1eborderlands3seasonpbl3p.description: Continue your Borderlands 3 adventure with the Season Pass, featuring exclusive cosmetic items and four story campaign add-ons with new missions and challenges! This content is included with purchase of the Borderlands 3 Super Deluxe Edition. The Season Pass includes: • 4 campaign add-on packs featuring new stories, missions and challenges • Butt Stallion weapon skin • Butt Stallion weapon trinket • Butt Stallion grenade mod. All Season Pass add-on content will be available by September 2020.
be080ao1eborderlands3seasonpbl3p.name: Borderlands®3 Season Pass

be080ao2bborderlands3buttsaicmpk.description: The Butt Stallion Cosmetic Pack includes the following content, for use in Borderlands 3: • Butt Stallion weapon skin • Butt Stallion weapon trinket • Butt Stallion grenade mod. This content is included in the Borderlands 3 Season Pass.
be080ao2bborderlands3buttsaicmpk.name: Borderlands®3 Butt Stallion Cosmetic Pack

be080ao2bborderlands3toybxweapck.description: The Toy Box Weapons Pack includes the following content, for use in Borderlands 3: • Toy Guns with unique effects • Toy grenade mod • Toy weapon trinket. This content is included in the Borderlands 3 Deluxe Edition and Super Deluxe Edition.
be080ao2bborderlands3toybxweapck.name: Borderlands®3 Toy Box Weapons Pack

be080ao33borderlands3bostmpackl3.description: The Boost Mods Pack includes two equippable mods, for use in Borderlands 3: • XP boost mod • Loot drop boost mod. This content is included in the Borderlands 3 Deluxe Edition and Super Deluxe Edition.
be080ao33borderlands3bostmpackl3.name: Borderlands®3 Boost Mods Pack

be080ao85borderlands3neocsmticpk.description: The Neon Cosmetic Pack includes the following content, for use in Borderlands 3: • Neon Vault Hunter head • Neon Vault Hunter skin • Neon Echo Device skin • Neon weapon trinket. This content is included in the Borderlands 3 Deluxe Edition and Super Deluxe Edition.
be080ao85borderlands3neocsmticpk.name: Borderlands®3 Neon Cosmetic Pack

be080ao8eborderlands3geabxcmtipk.description: The Gearbox Cosmetic Pack includes the following content, for use in Borderlands 3: • Gearbox weapon skin • Gearbox weapon trinket. This content is included in the Borderlands 3 Deluxe Edition and Super Deluxe Edition.
be080ao8eborderlands3geabxcmtipk.name: Borderlands®3 Gearbox Cosmetic Pack

be080aofcborderlands3etocsmticpk.description: The Retro Cosmetic Pack includes the following content, for use in Borderlands 3: • Retro Vault Hunter head • Retro Vault Hunter skin • Retro Echo Device skin • Retro weapon skin. This content is included in the Borderlands 3 Deluxe Edition and Super Deluxe Edition.
be080aofcborderlands3etocsmticpk.name: Borderlands®3 Retro Cosmetic Pack

be080axf4borderlands3eluxitionb3.description: The Deluxe Edition includes: • Retro Cosmetic Pack: Vault Hunter head & skin, ECHO Device skin, weapon skin • Neon Cosmetic Pack: Vault Hunter head & skin, ECHO Device skin, trinket • Gearbox Cosmetic Pack: weapon skin, trinket • Toy Box Weapons Pack: 2 Toy guns, Toy grenade mod, trinket • Equippable XP & Loot Drop Boost Mods The original shooter-looter returns, packing bazillions of guns and an all-new mayhem-fueled adventure! Blast through new worlds and enemies as one of 4 brand new Vault Hunters. Play solo or with friends to take on insane enemies, score loads of loot and save your home.
be080axf4borderlands3eluxitionb3.name: Borderlands®3 Deluxe Edition

be080axfbborderlands3supeluxitio.description: The Super Deluxe Edition includes the Season Pass and Deluxe bonus content. Season Pass: • 4 campaign add-on's • Butt Stallion weapon skin, weapon trinket, and grenade mod. Deluxe bonus content: • Retro Cosmetic Pack • Neon Cosmetic Pack • Gearbox Cosmetic Pack  • Toy Box Weapons Pack • Equippable XP & Loot Drop Boost Mods. The original shooter-looter returns, packing bazillions of guns and an all-new mayhem-fueled adventure! Blast through new worlds and enemies as one of 4 brand new Vault Hunters. Play solo or with friends to take on insane enemies, score loads of loot and save your home.
be080axfbborderlands3supeluxitio.name: Borderlands®3 Super Deluxe Edition

c121d8g6ethumperthumperb3fa744b5.description: Thumper is rhythm violence: classic rhythm-action, blistering speed, and brutal physicality. You are a space beetle. Brave the hellish void and confront a maniacal giant head from the future.
c121d8g6ethumperthumperb3fa744b5.name: Thumper

c19285gfaorcsmustdie3game3051574.description: Orcs Must Die! 3 ushers orc-slaying mayhem to a previously unimaginable scale. All new War Scenarios pit players and their friends against the largest orc armies ever assembled. War Machines give players the essential firepower to heave, stab, carbonize, and disarticulate the abominable intruders. Orcs Must Die! 3 is the long-awaited successor to the award-winning series.
c19285gfaorcsmustdie3game3051574.name: Orcs Must Die! 3

c48985gf6steamworlddiggame19ff25.description: SteamWorld Dig is a platform mining adventure with strong Metroidvanian influences. Take the role of Rusty, a lone mining steambot, as he arrives at an old mining town in great need. Dig your way through the old earth, gaining riches while uncovering the ancient threat that lurks below...
c48985gf6steamworlddiggame19ff25.name: SteamWorld Dig

c727a9g43jotunvalhallaeditionjou.description: Jotun is a hand-drawn action-exploration game set in Norse mythology. In Jotun, you play Thora, a Viking warrior who died an inglorious death and must prove herself to the Gods to enter Valhalla. Explore vast regions of Norse Purgatory to find runes to unleash the jotun, giant Norse elementals. Fight them using only your massive two-handed axe, the blessings of the Gods and your skills! Impress the Gods!
c727a9g43jotunvalhallaeditionjou.name: Jotun: Valhalla Edition

c91199g68celesteceleste8e4f8d4c6.description: Help Madeline survive her inner demons on her journey to the top of Celeste Mountain, in this super-tight platformer from the creators of TowerFall. Brave hundreds of hand-crafted challenges, uncover devious secrets, and piece together the mystery of the mountain.
c91199g68celesteceleste8e4f8d4c6.name: Celeste

ca805dg75gridgridstandardedition.description: GRID is a racing experience like no other. Offering unrivalled wheel-to-wheel racing for everyone, where every race is unpredictable as you create rivals and nemeses on your road to conquering the world of motorsport. Play now and get your heart racing.
ca805dg75gridgridstandardedition.name: GRID

ca805do42gridultimateupgradeglmp.description: Upgrade to GRID Ultimate Season Pass to get 6 months of premium content including: 99 extra Career events (33 per season), 12 new cars (4 per season) & Seasonal rewards*: Season 1 (Hot Hatch Showdown), Season 2 (Track Day Supercars), Season 3 (Track Day Hypercars). 5 Grid Edition Carbon Liveries (each with added XP boost): Aston Martin Vantage GT4, Pontiac Firebird Modified, Chevrolet Corvette C7.R, Mitsubishi Lancer Evolution VI Time Attack,  enault R26. 10 player cards, 10 player banners, 10 extra unique liveries, VIP status.
ca805do42gridultimateupgradeglmp.name: GRID Ultimate Upgrade

ca805dx4fgridultimateedongrulmao.description: Be an Ultimate Edition GRID player to get 6 months of premium content including: 99 extra Career events (33 per season), 12 new cars (4 per season) & Seasonal rewards*: Season 1 (Hot Hatch Showdown), Season 2 (Track Day Supercars), Season 3 (Track Day Hypercars). 5 Grid Edition Carbon Liveries (each with added XP boost): Aston Martin Vantage GT4, Pontiac Firebird Modified, Chevrolet Corvette C7.R, Mitsubishi Lancer Evolution VI Time Attack, Renault R26. 10 player cards, 10 player banners, 10 extra unique liveries, VIP status.
ca805dx4fgridultimateedongrulmao.name: GRID Ultimate Edition

cabec5g45serioussamcollectiongam.description: Step into the shoes of the legendary action hero Sam "Serious" Stone and experience one of the most explosive shooter game series of all time, as you save the world from a merciless alien invasion.
cabec5g45serioussamcollectiongam.name: Serious Sam Collection

cba537ga7zombiearmy4deadwrzobiy4.description: Hitler’s hordes are back for more in this spine-chilling shooter! Occult enemies, epic weapons and a new campaign for 1-4 players await, as you fight to save humankind from undead Armageddon!
cba537ga7zombiearmy4deadwrzobiy4.name: Zombie Army 4: Dead War

cba537o06zombiearmy4seasonpasonp.description: ZOMBIE ARMY 4: SEASON PASS ONE, INCLUDING 3 ADDITIONAL LEVELS. CHARACTER PACKS. WEAPON BUNDLES. WEAPON SKIN PACKS AND CHARACTER OUTFIT BUNDLES. All Season Pass One add-on content will be available by Holiday 2020.
cba537o06zombiearmy4seasonpasonp.name: Zombie Army 4: Season Pass One

cba537o50zombiearmy4undecvkltf06.description: As a former sniper, Karl Fairburne had all the tools he needed to get behind enemy lines, including impersonating a Nazi officer! This disguise doesn’t work against the dead, but at least it keeps the blood off! This content is included with the purchase of the Zombie Army 4: Season Pass One.
cba537o50zombiearmy4undecvkltf06.name: Zombie Army 4: Undercover Karl Outfit

cba537o93zombiearmy4fg42utclnd03.description: One of the most advanced weapons of World War 2 salvaged for the Dead War, The FG-42 automatic rifle is a destructive upgrade to your arsenal - packing all of the intense firepower of a light machine gun with none of the heft! This content is included with the purchase of the Zombie Army 4: Season Pass One.
cba537o93zombiearmy4fg42utclnd03.name: Zombie Army 4: FG-42 Automatic Rifle Bundle

cba537o94zombiearmy4undeadchtl02.description: When Plan Z was unleashed, millions of soldiers rose from the dead – but not everyone came back as a mindless ghoul! Hector crashed in the Alps during the Dead War, and isn’t going to let that whole ‘being dead’ thing get in the way of his duty as a gentleman! Just try not to catch yourself on the propeller blade sticking out of his chest. This content is included with the purchase of the Zombie Army 4: Season Pass One.
cba537o94zombiearmy4undeadchtl02.name: Zombie Army 4: Undead Airman Character

cba537oa2zombiearmy4solidgwpnkc0.description: With the Dead War devaluing gold to nothing, the survivors have found a new use for it. Annihilate the undead with an air of class! Apply a brilliant gold sheen to your guns with these skins. This content is included with the purchase of the Zombie Army 4: Season Pass One.
cba537oa2zombiearmy4solidgwpnkc0.name: Zombie Army 4: Solid Gold Weapon Skins

cba537x13zombiearmy4deadwrluxitn.description: The Zombie Army 4 Deluxe Edition includes: MAIN GAME, ADDITIONAL CHARACTER PACK Playable Character: Undead Airman, ADDITIONAL WEAPON SKIN PACK Weapon Skins: Solid Gold, ADDITIONAL WEAPON BUNDLE Weapon Bundle: FG-42 Semi-auto Rifle, ADDITIONAL CHARACTER OUTFIT BUNDLE Character Outfit: Undercover Karl.
cba537x13zombiearmy4deadwrluxitn.name: Zombie Army 4: Dead War Deluxe Edition

cba537x50zombiearmy4deadwsuplxtn.description: Augment your Zombie Army 4 experience with an entire season of post-launch content with the Super Deluxe Edition.  The Zombie Army 4 Super Deluxe Edition includes: MAIN GAME, ZOMBIE ARMY 4: SEASON PASS ONE, INCLUDING 3 ADDITIONAL LEVELS, 4 CHARACTER PACKS, 9 WEAPON BUNDLES, 5 WEAPON SKIN PACKS, 4 CHARACTER OUTFIT BUNDLES.
cba537x50zombiearmy4deadwsuplxtn.name: Zombie Army 4: Dead War Super Deluxe Edition

cc9743g94thecrew2thecrew24908874.description: In The Crew 2, take on the American motorsports scene as you explore and dominate the land, air, and sea of the United States in one of the most exhilarating open worlds ever created.  With a wide variety of exotic cars, bikes, boats, and planes to choose from, experience the unbridled thrill and adrenaline-pumping excitement of competing across the entire USA as you test your skills in a wide range of driving disciplines. Record every heart-pounding, white-knuckle, moment and share them with the simple push of a button - fame is yours to take! Play with up to 7 friends online.
cc9743g94thecrew2thecrew24908874.name: The Crew 2

cc9743o38thecrew2motorspsdluxpak.description: The Crew 2 Motorsports Deluxe Pack includes: Ford F-150 Raptor Race Truck 2017, Abarth 500 2008 Monster Truck Edition, Pilatus PC-21, 3 outfits to customize your avatar
cc9743o38thecrew2motorspsdluxpak.name: The Crew 2 - Motorsports Deluxe Pack

cc9743oadthecrew2seasonpasseaonp.description: Upgrade your American Motorsport adventures with the Season Pass: Get immediate access to 25 vehicles, including three exclusive to the Season Pass. Drive the Ferrari FXX K 2014, the Mitsubishi Lancer Evolution X 2014, the Porsche 911 Turbo 3.6 1993 and more. A permanent VIP 20% in-game discount will allow you to buy more vehicles and customizations. Enjoy an additional home location to showcase your vehicles in style. Customize your avatar with two unique outfits to show off your personal flare.
cc9743oadthecrew2seasonpasseaonp.name: THE CREW 2 - SEASON PASS

cc9743x1ethecrew2goldeditiongoln.description: The Crew 2 - Gold Edition features : The Crew 2 Season Pass , The Crew 2 Motorsports Deluxe Pack that includes: Ford F-150 Raptor Race Truck 2017, Abarth 500 2008 Monster Truck Edition, 3 outfits to customize your pilot. Take on the American motorsports scene as you explore and dominate the land, air, and sea across the entire USA. With a wide variety of cars, bikes, boats, and planes, compete in a wide range of driving disciplines.
cc9743x1ethecrew2goldeditiongoln.name: The Crew 2 - Gold Edition

cc9743xecthecrew2dluxditionluxon.description: The Crew 2 - Deluxe Edition features The Crew 2 Motorsports Deluxe Pack which includes: Ford F-150 Raptor Race Truck 2017, Abarth 500 2008 Monster Truck Edition, Pilatus PC-21, 3 outfits to customize your avatar. Take on the American motorsports scene as you explore and dominate the land, air, and sea across the entire USA. With a wide variety of cars, bikes, boats, and planes, compete in a wide range of driving disciplines.
cc9743xecthecrew2dluxditionluxon.name: The Crew 2 - Deluxe Edition

cfd297ge8theturingtestgame7e1b9f.description: The Turing Test is a challenging first-person puzzle game set on Jupiter’s moon, Europa. You are Ava Turing, an engineer for the International Space Agency (ISA) sent to discover the cause behind the disappearance of the ground crew stationed there. Upon arrival a series of puzzles awaits you – tests which, according to the station’s AI, Tom, can only be solved by a human. These puzzles have apparently been set by the missing ground crew – but why have they created them and what are they hiding from?
cfd297ge8theturingtestgame7e1b9f.name: The Turing Test

d334begablostwordsbeyndthepaggam.description: Interact with the words inscribed in the pages of a young girl’s diary to solve challenging puzzles, tackle unique platforming segments and discover an emotional tale set across the vibrant world of Estoria in Lost Words: Beyond the Page. Personal diary entries belonging to a young girl named Izzy will unfold as you explore a fantasy land where words hold immense power. Featuring an immersive story crafted by renowned games writer Rhianna Pratchett, Lost Words: Beyond the Page will mesmerize players with its unique blend of gameplay mechanics and striking watercolor aesthetic. Driven by the player’s curiosity, the world of Estoria and the power it holds will serve as the engine that will propel Izzy through this deeply personal narrative, resulting in a truly memorable experience.
d334begablostwordsbeyndthepaggam.name: Lost Words: Beyond the Page

d43cd4gbethedivision2standareogm.description: HISTORY WILL REMEMBER. In The Division 2, the fate of the free world is on the line. Lead a team of elite agents into a post-pandemic Washington DC to restore order and prevent the collapse of the city. The Division 2 is an online, action shooter RPG experience, where exploration and player-progression are essential. Liberate Washington DC – Save a country on the brink of collapse as you explore an open, dynamic and hostile world. Stronger with your team – Specialize and fight together with your friends in online co-op or against others in competitive adversial PVP mode. Genre-defining endgame – Choose a unique class specialization to take on the toughest challenges with friends.
d43cd4gbethedivision2standareogm.name: The Division 2 - Standard Edition

d43cd4o2cthedivison2batleworncpk.description: The Battleworn Secret Service pack includes: Battleworn Secret Service outfit, Secret service emote, Secret Service weapon skin.
d43cd4o2cthedivison2batleworncpk.name: The Division 2 - Battleworn Secret Service Pack

d43cd4o35thedivison2warlorfykxpc.description: Embark on an intense manhunt across Manhattan. New York is under threat. Aaron Keener, a former Division Agent turned rogue, has taken control of Lower Manhattan, backed by four devoted and highly skilled lieutenants. Trained by The Division but disavowing its ideals, they are now the highest authority in town and the most formidable force the Agents have ever faced. Play in single-player or online co-op: a gripping new story, hunting down your nemesis; a level 30 boost, allowing you to jump right into the Warlords of New York campaign; a new open world in New York; a revamped progression system with a level cap increased to 40; an ew tactical options: exotics, gears, and skills; an extended endgame, including thematic three-month seasons
d43cd4o35thedivison2warlorfykxpc.name: The Division 2: Warlords of New York Expansion

d43cd4oa8thedivison2year1pasyrck.description: Enhance your The Division 2 experience with the Year 1 Pass! The Year 1 Pass includes: Instant unlock of all Year 1 Specializations, 7-day early access to all Year 1 Episodes, 8 exclusive narrative missions "Classified Assignments: the Fall of D.C.", A VIP status during Year 1, including additional assignments, rewards and discounts, 1 exclusive outfit & 1 exclusive emote
d43cd4oa8thedivison2year1pasyrck.name: The Division 2 - Year 1 Pass

d43cd4obbthedivison2eltagnpacklg.description: The Elite Agent pack includes: An exotic Assault Rifle, An exclusive skill effect, A headstart stash space.
d43cd4obbthedivison2eltagnpacklg.name: The Division 2 - Elite Agent Pack

d43cd4obbthedivison2frstreponack.description: The First Responder pack includes: First Responder outfit, First Responder weapon skin.
d43cd4obbthedivison2frstreponack.name: The Division 2 - First Responder Pack

d43cd4xb9thedivison2warlfykumgcb.description: In the Warlords of New York expansion, hunt down your nemesis, Aaron Keener, a former Division Agent who has taken control of New York. Trained by The Division but disavowing its ideals, he is now the highest authority in town. Tom Clancy’s The Division 2 Warlords of New York - Ultimate Edition includes:  the base game, the Warlords of New York expansion, a level 30 boost, allowing you to jump right into the Warlords of New York campaign, the instant unlock of all 6 endgame specializations, 8 exclusive Classified assignments missions, the Battleworn secret service pack, the First Responder pack, the Elite Agent pack, 1 exclusive emote, 1 exclusive outfit
d43cd4xb9thedivison2warlfykumgcb.name: The Division 2: Warlords of New York Ultimate Edition

d43cd4xf9thedivison2warlfykgmcbu.description: INCLUDES THE DIVISION 2 + EXPANSION. In the Warlords of New York expansion, hunt down your nemesis, Aaron Keener, a former Division Agent who has taken control of New York. Trained by The Division but disavowing its ideals, he is now the highest authority in town. Includes a level 30 boost, allowing you to jump right into the Warlords of New York campaign. Play solo or online co-op. Experience a gripping story set in a post-pandemic country. Explore two open worlds: Washington, DC, and New York City. Create and level up your own Division Agent. Play intense PvP in the Dark Zones. Enjoy an extended endgame, including thematic three-month seasons
d43cd4xf9thedivison2warlfykgmcbu.name: The Division 2 - Warlords of New York Edition

d50e1cg3amonsterenrgyupchfialvd3.description: The only Official Monster Energy AMA Supercross Championship videogame is back! Relive the 2019 Supercross season with 100 riders of both 450SX and 250SX categories, 15 official stadiums and tracks and for the first time in the series you'll be able to join the official teams in the career mode. Enjoy an amazing Co-op experience with your friends in the new compound! Have fun with an improved multiplayer experience thanks to the new dedicated servers and play as a Race Director! Create and share an infinite number of tracks with the track editor! Race as a female rider to become the next Supercross champion. New ground and in-air physics, new rider models and new animations will give you a more immersive experience to enjoy the Supercross world at its best!
d50e1cg3amonsterenrgyupchfialvd3.name: Monster Energy Supercross - The Official Videogame 3

d59957g22embrearlyaccessembr6cdd.description:
Stadia Early Access Disclaimer:
This game is an unfinished product; it might have playability issues (including the potential loss of save progress), change without notice, and may or may not be updated further or completed. Purchase only if you want to play the game in its current state of development. You may lose access if the publisher does not finish the game. Access our help center to learn more about early access. Learn more about early access [https://support.google.com/stadia?p=early_access] 

Embr is planning to stay in Early Access for 12 months. Muse Games and Curve Digital want to make sure the game launches in a state that we, and you, are happy with, and we don't want to rush this process. For full release, we are looking to add 2-3 times the amount of content as well as a number of additional game modes, we are aiming to add campaigns with a series of escalating missions and narrative threads. Progression wise, we want to flesh out tools and cosmetic customization. Asset wise, we aim to expand the asset set from residential to industrial. Further work includes localization beyond just English. Please‌ ‌head‌ ‌to‌ ‌our‌ ‌official‌ ‌site‌ ‌to‌ ‌join‌ ‌the‌ ‌discussions!‌ Community Site [https://discord.gg/embr] 

Join Embr, THE Emergency Services Revolution, and become an Embr Respondr™ today! Fight fires and save lives while climbing the ladder of success, all within the comfort of flexible working hours. Embr's mission is simple; bring über firefighting to everyone, everywhere.

As an Embr Respondr™️ you'll answer clients' calls for help, and bring firefighting directly to their door! Break down doors, clear gas leaks and put out fires - no job is too much for an Embr Respondr™️.
d59957g22embrearlyaccessembr6cdd.name: Embr Early Access

da94f3g8dkinekinegameaa88b24eb6a.description: Kine is a 3D narrative puzzle game about three daring machines that aspire to be musicians. Embark across a theatrical dreamscape by solving a wide variety of increasingly difficult 3D puzzles. Guide Euler, Quat, and Roo as they struggle to form a band, build bonds, and find their big break!
da94f3g8dkinekinegameaa88b24eb6a.name: Kine

e465c4gb0motogp20game086aff48849.description: Experience all the thrills of the more-complete-than-ever Managerial Career mode and decide whether to join a 2020 season team or join a totally brand new team. Discover more realistic physics, improved graphics, new 3D models for the riders and face scans of official team managers, plus new animations. You will also have to learn how to manage the wear of tyres. Customize bikes and suits! Find the best combination of sponsor and livery, and choose colours and materials. Coordinate everything with your suit to win in style! Compete with legendary riders! New historic content and a new gaming mode await you to let you relive MotoGP™ history.
e465c4gb0motogp20game086aff48849.name: MotoGP™20

e5c6ecgf5riseofthetombad20ycln15.description: Rise of the Tomb Raider: 20 Year Celebration includes the base game and Season Pass featuring all-new content. Explore Croft Manor in the new "Blood Ties" story, then defend it against a zombie invasion in "Lara’s Nightmare". Survive extreme conditions with a friend in the new online Co-Op Endurance mode, and brave the new "Extreme Survivor" difficulty. Also features an outfit and weapon inspired by Tomb Raider III, and 5 classic Lara skins.
e5c6ecgf5riseofthetombad20ycln15.name: Rise of the Tomb Raider: 20 Year Celebration

ebf235gc5farmingsimulator19fs190.description: In Farming Simulator 19 you’ll take control of vehicles and machines faithfully recreated from all the leading brands in the industry, including John Deere, Case IH, New Holland, Challenger, Fendt, Massey Ferguson, Valtra, Krone, Deutz-Fahr and many more. Explore new American and European environments in which to develop and expand your farm. Enjoy many exciting new farming activities, including new machinery and crops with cotton and oat! Tend to your livestock of pigs, cows, sheep, and chickens - or ride your horses for the first time.
ebf235gc5farmingsimulator19fs190.name: Farming Simulator 19

ebf235o7cfarmingsulto19pexdc86b5.description: For the first time in franchise history, discover CLAAS, one of the world’s leading farming brands, and its new vehicles allowing you to expand a wide range of activities such as forage harvesting and baling. Over 35 faithfully reproduced vehicles and tools from CLAAS join the already huge garage of Farming Simulator 19, including the new LEXION 8900 combine harvester and its unique technology, the JAGUAR 960 TT forage harvester for effective silage, and the powerful XERION 5000 tractor.
ebf235o7cfarmingsulto19pexdc86b5.name: Farming Simulator 19 Platinum Expansion

ebf235x02farmingsimulator19plted.description: Take on the role of a modern farmer in Farming Simulator 19 Platinum Edition! For the first time in the franchise history, discover CLAAS, one of the world's leading farming brands. Enjoy over 380 machines from John Deere, CASE IH, New Holland, Challenger, Fendt, Massey Ferguson, Valtra, Krone, Deutz-Fahr and many more. Including more than 35 new CLAAS vehicles and tools to grow your farm alone or with other players in two huge maps filled with exciting farming activities, crops to harvest and animals to tend to.
ebf235x02farmingsimulator19plted.name: Farming Simulator 19 Platinum Edition

ef14fbg38monsterboyandthecurskig.description: A legendary series returns with a grand new adventure! Enjoy a colorful action-adventure game made alongside Ryuichi Nishizawa, creator of the original Wonder Boy in Monster World series. Monster Boy and the Cursed Kingdom borrows the best from the classic series to deliver a fresh, modern adventure with fun gameplay, memorable music and gorgeous hand drawn animations. Can Jin save Monster World Kingdom? Help our young hero defeat challenging enemies, discover hidden locations, upgrade powerful equipment, and more! You'll also unlock special forms with unique skills used to open new paths where mighty bosses and secret treasures await.
ef14fbg38monsterboyandthecurskig.name: Monster Boy and the Cursed Kingdom

efa3b6gbbshadowofthetmbrainv1502.description: In Shadow of the Tomb Raider Definitive Edition experience the final chapter of Lara’s origin as she is forged into the Tomb Raider she is destined to be. Combining the base game, all seven DLC challenge tombs, as well as all downloadable weapons, outfits, and skills, Shadow of the Tomb Raider Definitive Edition is the ultimate way to experience Lara’s defining moment.
efa3b6gbbshadowofthetmbrainv1502.name: Shadow of the Tomb Raider Definitive Edition

f3519fg60f12020f120203dc3d74fbb8.description: F1® 2020 allows you to create your F1® team for the very first time and race alongside the official teams and drivers. Alternatively, challenge your friends in new split-screen with casual race options for more relaxed racing. Compete on 22 circuits, with current and classic content.
f3519fg60f12020f120203dc3d74fbb8.name: F1® 2020

f3519fo06f12020schumacherditonpg.description: Celebrate the record-breaking F1® career of the legendary Michael Schumacher. Take to the circuit in four of his most iconic cars and receive exclusive content including Michael Schumacher-themed multiplayer car liveries, helmets, race suits, and a podium celebration emote. You can also embark on your career using a Michael Schumacher driver model. x4 iconic Michael Schumacher cars: 1991 Jordan 191, 1994 Benetton B194, 1995 Benetton B195, 2000 Ferrari F1-2000.  Exclusive Michael Schumacher in-game model, race suits, helmet designs and podium celebration emote.  Unique Schumacher-inspired multiplayer car liveries.
f3519fo06f12020schumacherditonpg.name: F1® 2020: Schumacher Edition AOC

f3519fo63f1202010pitcoinf12coins.description: Buy 10,000 PitCoin, the in-game currency that can be spent on the Formula 1® 2020 Podium Pass and Item Shop. You can use this currency to purchase Car Liveries, Race Suits, Gloves, Helmets, Emotes and Poses from the Item Shop at any time. PitCoin can also be used to purchase the latest series’ VIP Podium Pass, unlocking the ability to earn some awesome customisation content! All PitCoin purchased on one platform may not be redeemable on other platforms. Note: Items purchased with PitCoin do not transfer between Codemasters F1 products.
f3519fo63f1202010pitcoinf12coins.name: F1 2020 10,000 PitCoin

f3519fo7bf12020f1sevntydioacupgr.description: Celebrate the 70th anniversary of F1® with these unique in-game customisation items - car livery, podium celebration, helmet, race suit, gloves, boots and player badge.
f3519fo7bf12020f1sevntydioacupgr.name: F1® 2020: F1® Seventy Edition AOC

f3519fobdf12020150pitcoinf1cons5.description: Buy 15,000 PitCoin, the in-game currency that can be spent on the Formula 1® 2020 Podium Pass and Item Shop. You can use this currency to purchase Car Liveries, Race Suits, Gloves, Helmets, Emotes and Poses from the Item Shop at any time. PitCoin can also be used to purchase the latest series’ VIP Podium Pass, unlocking the ability to earn some awesome customisation content! All PitCoin purchased on one platform may not be redeemable on other platforms. Note: Items purchased with PitCoin do not transfer between Codemasters F1 products.
f3519fobdf12020150pitcoinf1cons5.name: F1 2020 15,000 PitCoin

f3519fx5cf12020deluxeschumariton.description: Celebrate the record-breaking F1® career of the legendary Michael Schumacher. Take to the circuit in four of his most iconic cars and receive exclusive content including Michael Schumacher-themed multiplayer car liveries, helmets, race suits, and a podium celebration emote. You can also embark on your career using a Michael Schumacher driver model.  The entire F1® 2020 game and the “Seventy Edition” AOC Content. x4 iconic Michael Schumacher cars: 1991 Jordan 191, 1994 Benetton B194, 1995 Benetton B195, 2000 Ferrari F1-2000. Exclusive Michael Schumacher in-game model, race suits, helmet designs and podium celebration emote.  Unique Schumacher-inspired multiplayer car liveries.
f3519fx5cf12020deluxeschumariton.name: F1® 2020 Deluxe Schumacher Edition

f3519fxdef12020f1seventyditionsv.description: F1® 2020 allows you to create your F1® team for the very first time and race alongside the official teams and drivers. Alternatively, challenge your friends in new split-screen with casual race options for more relaxed racing. Compete on 22 circuits, with current and classic content. Celebrate the 70th anniversary of F1® with these unique in-game customisation items - car livery, podium celebration, helmet, race suit, gloves, boots and player badge.
f3519fxdef12020f1seventyditionsv.name: F1® 2020 F1® Seventy Edition

f39390g6cdarksidegnf390548b26c1p.description: DARKSIDERS: GENESIS is an action/adventure that tears its way through hordes of demons, angels, and everything in-between on its way to Hell and back with guns blazing and swords swinging.  Genesis gives players their first look at the world of DARKSIDERS before the events of the original game, as well as introduces the horseman STRIFE.
f39390g6cdarksidegnf390548b26c1p.name: Darksiders Genesis

f5f970g12konakona8a422a44cc876c2.description: Northern Canada, 1970. A strange blizzard ravages Atamipek Lake. Step into the shoes of a detective to explore the eerie village, investigate surreal events, and battle the elements to survive. Kona is a chilly interactive tale you won't soon forget.
f5f970g12konakona8a422a44cc876c2.name: Kona

f7afcfgcesuperhotsuperhotgamef70.description:
Blurring the lines between cautious strategy and unbridled mayhem, SUPERHOT is the FPS in which time moves only when you move. No regenerating health bars. No conveniently placed ammo drops. It's just you, outnumbered and outgunned, grabbing the weapons of fallen enemies to shoot, slice, and maneuver through a hurricane of slow-motion bullets.
With its unique, stylized graphics SUPERHOT finally adds something new and disruptive to the FPS genre. SUPERHOT’s polished, minimalist visual language helps you concentrate on the most important - on the fluidity of gameplay and cinematic beauty of the fight.
f7afcfgcesuperhotsuperhotgamef70.name: SUPERHOT

ffda0bgacpanzerdragoonremakepzd7.description: A new, remade version of the Panzer Dragoon game - true to the original, with improved graphics and controls, that suit modern gaming standards! On a far, lone planet, you encounter two dragons awaken from the ancient times. Armed with a deadly gun from the past and the guidance of your armored blue dragon,  you must fulfill your destiny and keep the Prototype Dragon from reaching the Tower or die trying.  Features:  - Pilot through seven unbelievably realistic levels ranging from tropical blue ocean cities to intricate subterranean ruins.  - Attack approaching from all sides enemies quickly and without mercy, with improved 360-degree controls and lock-on targeting.
ffda0bgacpanzerdragoonremakepzd7.name: Panzer Dragoon: Remake
